#summary Intro page for RepLib Library

= RepLib = 

RepLib is a Haskell Library for automatically deriving instances of type classes using generic programming. 




= Links =

The old webpage for RepLib is [http://www.cis.upenn.edu/~sweirich/RepLib/ here]. It is no longer updated and will go away soon.

RepLib is available on [http://hackage.haskell.org/package/RepLib Hackage]
